must_include: Specific tool name in title (ChatGPT, Canva, Midjourney, Adobe)
SECRET or HIDDEN or FREE angle
content_requirements.hook_structure: Show END RESULT in first 3 seconds (like Text to 3D did)

proven_high_performers: Text-to-3D tools (Luma, CSM, Meshy) - 461.73% proven (video_id: MNuKOhfrYNA)
avoid_based_on_data: Generic '3 AI Tools' titles - avg 22.3% (eSZXioT-K1I: 11.91%, lvo2n2-QNfc: 26.22%, AlwXQHXHjDQ: 27.69%)
Vague tools without names - 'TOP YouTubers Secret': 26.22% (video_id: lvo2n2-QNfc)
List formats - consistently underperform single tool focus

hook_examples_that_worked: This AI turns text into 3D models in SECONDS (461.73%)
Instagram FREE AI makes you look like a pro photographer (71.28%)
Canva secret AI designs BETTER than professionals (70.02%)
hook_examples_that_failed: 3 AI tools that will blow your mind (generic - 11.91%)
Top YouTubers use these 3 AI tools (no specificity - 26.22%)
bullet_structure: Bullet 1: What the tool does and why it is SECRET/HIDDEN/FREE
Bullet 2: How to access it (step-by-step under 15 words)
Bullet 3: Specific result you get (with before/after proof)
script_guidance.cta_template: Next Thursday (Episode [N+1]): I am revealing [NEXT_TOOL] [SECRET_FEATURE]. Subscribe!

visual_pacing.seconds_0_3: Show the END RESULT (3D model, designed graphic, AI output) - CRITICAL for retention
visual_pacing.seconds_4_8: Quick problem setup (what you could not do before)
visual_pacing.seconds_9_20: Tool demo (how to use it, 3-5 seconds per step)

must_include: Shock value or entertainment angle (not just news)
Immediate WTF moment in first 3 seconds
Personal impact (how it affects viewer TODAY)
Bridge to Wednesday's related tool demo
content_requirements.hook_structure: Lead with the shocking/entertaining moment in first 3 seconds, explain after
content_requirements.posting_time: 23:00 UTC Friday (6 PM EST) - BEST day + BEST time combination

include: Game-changing AI announcements with clear demo
proven_failures_to_avoid: Generic news without entertainment (Clippy is BACK: 32.46%)
topics.filter_rule: Only post if it has ENTERTAINMENT value, not just news value

hook_examples_that_worked: A TikTok AI bot just flipped me off LIVE (80.69%)
Adobe AI is now running entire social media accounts (91.07%)
AWS outage gave AI literal brain rot (77.89%)
bullet_structure: Bullet 2: Why it matters to viewer TODAY
Bullet 3: Bridge to Wednesday's related practical tool
script_guidance.cta_template: Wednesday: [RELATED_PRACTICAL_TOOL]. Follow so you don't miss it!

bridge_to_wednesday.rule: Always connect Friday entertainment to Wednesday practical tool
examples: Rizzbot went viral → Wednesday: ChatGPT SECRET Conversation Tricks
Adobe AI automation → Wednesday: Adobe Express HIDDEN Features

visual_pacing.seconds_0_3: Show the SHOCKING moment (AI flipping off, unexpected behavior)

sunday_prep.reasoning: Capture the 'Sunday Scaries' audience looking to organize for the week. High engagement for planning content.

examples: Weekly Prep - Episode 1: Automate Your Monday Emails!
Weekly Prep - Episode 2: AI Plan Your Entire Week in 5 Mins
Weekly Prep - Episode 3: Stop Drowning in Meetings (AI Fix)

must_include: Calm, prepared vibe (contrast to Friday energy)

script_guidance.hook_structure: Ask 'Dreading Monday?' or 'Not ready for the week?' -> Show solution immediately

visual_pacing.seconds_0_5: The Pain Point (Messy calendar, inbox zero anxiety)
visual_pacing.seconds_6_15: The AI Solution (Fast demo of cleanup)
visual_pacing.seconds_16_25: The Result (Clean slate, peace of mind)
visual_pacing.seconds_26_30: CTA: 'See you Wednesday for the deep dive Tool Teardown!'

script_guidance.cta_template: See you Wednesday for the deep dive Tool Teardown!

experimental_sunday.reasoning: Low-risk slot to test format pivots before moving them to prime time (Wed/Fri).

examples: TEST: Can AI Write a Novel in 1 Hour?
TEST: AI vs Human Artist Speedrun
TEST: I let AI run my life for 24h

script_guidance.hook_structure: Pure visual hook or bold question
script_guidance.cta_template: Comment if you want more of this format

Highlight the exact prompt text for easy copying
